app.description: Mailchimp Mailshot Sync - No need to have the customer lists feature installed. Sync your user contacts into mailchim paccount or mark them as not for sync. Sycn on a per user basis or check out the global sync options on the navbar
app.name: Mailchimp Mailshot Sync

mailchimp_api_key.label: Mailchimp API Key
mailchimp_api_key.helpText: Login to Mailchimp --> Account --> Extras --> API Key

mailchimp_datacentre_prefix.label: Mailchimp Datacentre Prefix
mailchimp_datacentre_prefix.helpText: Login to Mailchimp --> look for the subdomain in the url after login: XXXX.admin.mailchimp.com

mailchimp_list_id.label: Mailchimp List ID of List to sync to
mailchimp_list_id.helpText: Login to Mailchimp --> Lists --> Select List --> Settings --> List Name and Defaults --> List ID (Should look something like 78ecb74923)

mailchimp_merge_field_forename.label: Mailchimp Tag Name of First Name merge field
mailchimp_merge_field_forename.helpText: Login to Mailchimp --> Lists --> Select List --> Settings --> List Fields --> Find Tag for First Name Field

mailchimp_merge_field_surname.label: Mailchimp Tag Name of Last Name name merge field
mailchimp_merge_field_surname.helpText: Login to Mailchimp --> Lists --> Select List --> Settings --> List Fields --> Find Tag for Last Name Field

fetch.fail: Failed to fetch information from the server
